name: jackwh/nylas-v3-api-php
description: Scheduler v3 is a [public beta release](https:///docs/support/product-lifecycle/#beta-release). It is generally stable, but some features might be added or changed before it is generally available. This API reference documentation covers the **Nylas Scheduler API**. See the see the [Administration API documentation](https:///docs/api/v3/admin/) for information about working with Nylas applications, authentication, connectors, and webhook subscriptions. Nylas API is designed using the [REST](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_State_Transfer) ideology to provide simple and predictable URIs to access and modify objects. Requests support [standard HTTP methods](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec9.html) like `GET`, `PUT`, `POST`, and `DELETE`, and [standard status codes](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html). Response bodies are always UTF-8 encoded JSON objects, unless explicitly documented otherwise.
